summary: This folder contains the official user documentation for WarpDatasets, focusing on the end-to-end lifecycle of machine learning datasets. It provides comprehensive guides for installation, dataset registration, S3 publishing, and cross-machine synchronization.
responsibilities: Onboarding new users via the Getting Started guide
Explaining the distinction between tabular-only and artifact-heavy datasets
Defining the required directory structure and manifest storage locations
Documenting the data loading modes (strict, hybrid, remote, local)
Providing a checklist for verifying dataset integrity after publishing
Listing common pitfalls such as absolute path usage in Parquet files
